field._createdAt.comment: The time when the usage record was created.
field.statusCode.comment: The status code of the usage record.
field.usedAmount.comment: The amount of the resource that was used.
field.deductedAmount.comment: The amount of the resource that was deducted.
field.remainingAmount.comment: The amount of the resource that remains.
field.metadata.comment: The metadata of the usage record.
